data.eml:eml: Barsura Volynkin, Dubatolov & Kishida, gen. nov., with descriptions of three new species (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Volynkin, Anton V., Dubatolov, Vladimir V., Kishida, Yasunori (2017): Barsura Volynkin, Dubatolov & Kishida, gen. nov., with descriptions of three new species (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae). Zootaxa 4299 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4299.1.2
